aiInstructions.READ_THIS_FIRST: This file is READ-ONLY. Primitive (layer 1) + Semantic (layer 2) tokens. Generated by DesignPush app.

DO_NOT_EDIT: tokens-core.json - Read-only, managed by DesignPush app
tokens-components.json - Read-only, managed by DesignPush app
core/* - Generated outputs, replaced on re-download
components/* - Generated outputs, replaced on re-download
CAN_EDIT: tokens-extended.json - Add custom tokens here (preserved on re-download)
../src/* - Your app code (sibling to design-system folder)
filePermissions.WHY: Token files are generated by DesignPush. User makes changes in the app, then re-exports. AI tools consume these files, they don't modify them.

tokenUsage.CRITICAL_RULE: Always use semantic tokens wherever possible. Use primitive tokens only if no relevant semantic tokens exist. Only hard-code values as a last resort.
referenceOrder: 2. Primitive tokens (--primitive-*) - fallback if no semantic exists
tokenUsage.WHY: Skipping layers breaks the chain. If you reference --primitive-typography-size-sm directly instead of --semantic-typography-label-sm-font-size, updates to the semantic layer will not flow through to your implementation.

example.explanation: The semantic token may change which primitive token it points to. Using semantic preserves that flexibility.

extendingTokens.HOW: To add new tokens, use tokens-extended.json, not this file.
extendingTokens.RULE: Never modify tokens-core.json or tokens-components.json directly.

architecture.primitive: Raw primitive values (colors, sizes, spacing). The building blocks.
architecture.semantic: Contextual meaning layer. Maps primitive tokens to purposes.
architecture.flow: component → semantic → primitive. Always reference semantic first.

relatedFiles.coreCSS: core/variables.css - Compiled CSS for primitive + semantic
relatedFiles.componentCSS: components/variables.css - Compiled CSS for patterns + components

text.$description: Text color on primary interactive surfaces

text-disabled.$description: Disabled text color on primary interactive surfaces

text.$description: Text color on secondary interactive surfaces

text-disabled.$description: Disabled text color on secondary interactive surfaces

text.$description: Text color on tertiary interactive surfaces

text-disabled.$description: Disabled text color on tertiary interactive surfaces

text.$description: Text color on destructive interactive surfaces

text-disabled.$description: Disabled text color on destructive interactive surfaces

slow.description: Slow transitions for large UI changes

color.description: Smooth color transitions for hover states
